user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an update on Project Falcon to me (sarah@apexmarketing.com). Ask him to consult his Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Project Falcon Update

Hi John,

Hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me a brief update on Project Falcon at your earliest convenience? Feel free to check your Gmail and our Notion workspace for the latest details that might help compile the summary.

Please forward the update to sarah@apexmarketing.com.

Thanks a lot for your help!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
